tweets.text: Analyzing or exploring a new dataset? I'm working on putting together an Observable Notebook Template for the initial step of getting your bearings with a new dataset https://t.co/dz00WvaDiR – anything I forgot? https://t.co/GlzQPJZR2E

@qualmist Data-driven animations / sequencing for me are interesting and I wanted to see if it were possible, maybe later things like: counties appear in order of polls closing, or margin of victory, or swing, and then we are embedding little context clues in the appearance animation

@qualmist Mostly stylistic / “jazz hands” intention, I want something that nebulously looks cool and unique– altho I suspect data-driven animated transitions between election years will be useful for object-constancy interpretation of how counties changed over time
